nodes.text: The Lenico system was an Outer Rim system near Dathomir, coreward of Phaeda.
During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the worlds of the Lenico system were known to have enormous and mysterious monuments carved from native stone.

It contained the planet Lenico IV, as well as many asteroids, including the Cairn Installation. Kyle Katarn traveled to the Lenico system in search of Desann and his Reborn and discovered the secret Cairn Installation where the Imperial Remnant was building the giant troopship Doomgiver for the attack on the Jedi academy in the Yavin system.
